price: But your people [O Prophet] have rejected this [Qur’an] although it is the truth. Say, “I am not a keeper over you.
arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِهِۦ قَوۡمُكَ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ قُل لَّسۡتُ عَلَيۡكُم بِوَكِيلٖ
